abstract.p: I-Behavior Inc of Harrison, NY, which gathers data on consumers and analyzes buying patterns, forms partnership with Direct Media Inc, broker of direct-marketing lists in Greenwich (S)

block.p: I-Behavior Inc., a Harrison-based company that gathers data on consumers and analyzes buying patterns, has announced a partnership with Direct Media Inc., a broker of direct-marketing lists in Greenwich. Under the deal, Direct Marketing will sell I-Behavior's cooperative database of customers to its clients in the catalog and publishing business in return for equity in the company. The database, the first of its kind, is a list of customers shared by several direct-marketing companies and operated by I-Behavior.
Customers ''opt in'' to the list and receive e-mail from I-Behavior about products made by database participants.

I-Behavior Inc., a Harrison-based company that gathers data on consumers and analyzes buying patterns, has announced a partnership with Direct Media Inc., a broker of direct-marketing lists in Greenwich. Under the deal, Direct Marketing will sell I-Behavior's cooperative database of customers to its clients in the catalog and publishing business in return for equity in the company. The database, the first of its kind, is a list of customers shared by several direct-marketing companies and operated by I-Behavior.
Customers ''opt in'' to the list and receive e-mail from I-Behavior about products made by database participants.
